price: Dhugumatti, Qur’aana hubachuuf laaffifneerra. Egaa namni gorfamu jiraa?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
